item.title: Apk - Edit and rebuild
item.description: Cheatsheet - Apk rebuild for debug purpose This tutorial describes the different steps to edit and rebuild an apk from the apk file. Prerequisites This manipulation require to enable USB debugging in your android device (https://developer.android.com/studio/debug/dev-options) and have adb, apktool, jarsigner, keytool and zipalign installed on your computer. A rooted device is NOT needed. Get the apk from adb : First, get the path to the apk in your filesystem :
